remarks: Value of the induced metric (distance function) of a normed complex vector space.  Equation 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 59.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
imsdval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
imsdval.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
imsdval.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
imsdval.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
imsdval $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( N ` ( A M B ) ) ) $.
